TopicTitle: KSP nominated for Best Sci-Fi Game - Voting now open

Articles.Content:
88% vote?

I'm sure KSP will win that award.

voted for KSP.
From 36% to 88% in just 3 hours!?

It certainly helps that KSP stands out so much from its competition there. It's pretty much "three identical-at-a-glance games vs. one game that's nothing like them". Also, it's the only one there that really deserves the award as far as I'm concerned, since it's the only one of the four that even tries to model real-world physics in space. Plus, it's a lot of fun; that helps too.
Voted! Also voted for Papers Please for best indie, of course, for the glory of Arztostka
hehe all those full fledged games have nothing on a game that's not even 25% done
Voted up KSP. Only one of the group I know in the first place, and the most awesome in its own right.

hehe all those full fledged games have nothing on a game that's not even 25% done

Word.

Voted! Also voted for Papers Please for best indie, of course, for the glory of Arztostka

This. And BF4 as well, for the shake of shooting buildings down to ashes xD

Voted GTA5 for the sandbox, BF4 for Best MP/Game of the Year/FPS, and of course KSP for the Best Sci-Fi !

KSP is way ahead first there as for 11/9, 15:00 PM UTC ! Great !
Uh, it seems KSP has the top 90% of votes....

Voted.

10char
How can I see the number of votes after I've voted?
Has anyone else noticed that one of the games KSP is competing against hasn't even been released yet? Who came up with these nominees?

*Looks at chart*

Do I even need to vote??

*Votes anyway*

Has anyone else noticed that one of the games KSP is competing against hasn't even been released yet? Who came up with these nominees?

Thats because they thought the soundtrack was the game.. I just voted

Has anyone else noticed that one of the games KSP is competing against hasn't even been released yet? Who came up with these nominees?

Well, maybe it was eligible because the game will be out for around 1-2 weeks when the voting closes.

Better for KSP, as this most probably greatly reduces the number of voters who will vote for it

Oh and I voted as well, of course
Looks like this little indie (KSP of course) is going to beat the massive MMO (EVE Online) 91%>4%

Voted. But I think the nominations are pretty suspect. Sandbox seems like a much more appropriate category to me, yet the nominees there are GTA, Assassins Creed and Far Cry. Um, what about Minecraft? Still, I'm glad it looks like KSP will win by a landslide in its category. Should help bring in some new players.

wow, KSP is not just pulling ahead, its dominating! 92%!! Obviously this is because KSP is a totally awesome suck you in game that gets into your dreams and interferes with everyday life, but do you think that some of it's success is to do with the ways of this community? I don't know the Eve community, but I've never been part of a gaming community that is as wonderful as this one, I'm sure that has something to do with it!

We need everyone here to vote! VOTE FOR THE WIIIIIIN!

EVERYONE! KSP IS DOING BETTER THAN EVE ONLINE AND X REBIRTH! :D:D:D

Here's a direct link to the Sci-Fi Vote.

Click here.

Not trying to take control of the thread. I'm just trying to make sure we all vote. Have the devs found out about this yet? We must alert them!

Direct link to Kerbal Space Program's nominee page.

(just trying to make things easier. sorry if this is against the rules.)

EDIT: T-16 days and counting. :anxioius:
Interesting that one of the other contenders is X Rebirth. That game isn't even out yet, how can it be nominated?
92% of votes to KSP. Wow that's impressive considering Eve, in second place, is getting 4% of the votes.
Yea, I think KSP will win.
what a stupid voting! X-Rebirth hasnt been released yet, EvE is an MMO (should be in the MMO section) and Swapper....... never heard of it
voted and done. Sucks that its up against Eve (I play it too)
